name: Rocks v2
description:
Rocks v2 is a medium-paced arcade shooter emphasizing targeting as opposed to just shooting everything. Small rocks may release crystal power-ups that when collected, upgrade shields and guns. Shooting these crystals will degrade your ship accordingly. This has the effect of usually doing short blasts in specific directions and herding enemies into positions that diminish that collateral damage.

  • 12 levels and an end game.
  • 4 epic boss battles.
  • Fantastic sound track.
  • Online high score tables.
  • Pilot training sessions.
  • 3 ships with different controls.
  • Windows, Mac and Linux.
  • DirectX and OpenGL drivers on Windows.
  • Light machine specs.
  • Nice small 5meg download!

Notes: The Linux version has only been tested on Ubuntu and that's the major distro I currently support. I'll work with people if they have issues on other major Linux distros.

Since I'm using an old sound library this application is not signed. On a mac you will need to right click it and choose Open from the menu.
